name: K-Jam 2022 Trapstar Deal Dam
description:
A small game about a trapstar, out dealing dam, made during a weekend game-jam at Aarhus University.

All art assets were created by ourselves. Some of the sounds and music were also created by ourselves.

Additional sounds are sampled from FreeSound.org under Creative Commons 4.0. The following sound files were used:

https://freesound.org/people/kennysvoice/sounds/351778/'

https://freesound.org/people/OnionEye/sounds/176748/

https://freesound.org/people/lumikon/sounds/564482/

https://freesound.org/people/Fantozzi/sounds/166285/

https://freesound.org/people/Kastenfrosch/sounds/521999/

https://freesound.org/people/Claiber7901/sounds/544677/

https://freesound.org/people/Cloud-10/sounds/545958/

https://freesound.org/people/Martina_Leitschuh/sounds/582758/

https://freesound.org/people/guitarguy1985/sounds/70938/
